In England, in the seven days to 13 June, there were 43,643 new confirmed cases (77.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 06 June, there were 30,428 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 43% (13,215 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 18 June is 4,019,956 (7,141.9 cases per 100,000 population).
